Class BaseBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.BaseBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Board

    public class BaseBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A basic board which can perform basic moves
